title: Amazon, Google, Microsoft likely to benefit from 'stable, healthy' cloud spending: UBS (AMZN:NASDAQ)
content:
With earnings right around the corner, Amazon ( NASDAQ: AMZN ), Google ( NASDAQ: GOOG ) ( NASDAQ: GOOGL ) and Microsoft ( NASDAQ: MSFT ) are likely to benefit from “stable” and “healthy” cloud spending, UBS said.

In speaking with 11 customers and partners at Oracle's ( ORCL ) AI World event, UBS
meta_description: With earnings right around the corner, Amazon (AMZN), Google (GOOG) (GOOGL) and Microsoft (MSFT) are likely to benefit from “stable” and “healthy” cloud spending, UBS said. Read for more.
